item.title: Automatically publishing websites with Hugo, Travis, and Github
item.description: Welcome to the new fardog.io: an HTTPS website which is hosted for free, easy to maintain, and automatically built when I push updates to a git repository. It’s backed by Hugo, Travis-CI, GitHub, and Cloudflare. Note: This article is out of date, as Travis-CI retired their open-source service and I moved the build to Github Actions. I’ll publish an update to this article in due time but until then, this pull request will explain the change.
